ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]How Your Brain Alters Your Reality (W/ Anil Seth) | How to Be a Better Human | TED

ns2:group.ns2:title: How Your Brain Alters Your Reality (W/ Anil Seth) | How to Be a Better Human | TED
ns2:group.ns2:description:
What is the aspect of being you that you cling to most tightly? Why are you you and not somebody else? How do you understand and make sense of your experiences? These are questions studied by Anil Seth, Professor of Cognitive and Computational Neuroscience and the University of Sussex. Anil and Chris reflect on the limitations in describing the brain as a ‚Äúsupercomputer,‚Äù the ethical and morally grey areas of technological advancements and brain computer interfaces, and how hallucinogenic drugs affect consciousness.
Follow Host: Chris Duffy (Instagram: @chrisiduffy | chrisduffycomedy.com) Guest: Anil Seth (Instagram: @profanilseth | LinkedIn: @anilseth | Website: https://www.anilseth.com/)
Links Being You: A New Science of Consciousness

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Amazon Web Services]Beyond the First Build: Khalil's Rapid Growth in AI | Amazon Web Services

ns2:group.ns2:title: Beyond the First Build: Khalil's Rapid Growth in AI | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
In this inspiring follow-up story, we revisit Khalil Adib, who we first met as an AI Engineer at Firemind. Since then, Khalil's rapidly advanced his career, earning a promotion to Senior AI Engineer in just 15 months - a testament to his expertise in this fast-moving field.
Watch as Khalil shares how he's navigating the evolving AI landscape, his approach to staying current with rapidly changing technologies, and how he's grown into his senior role. Learn how he balances technical innovation with practical implementation and hear his insights about building a career in AI.
This video is part of our "Beyond the First Build" series, showcasing how cloud skills can lead to dynamic career opportunities and meaningful professional growth. Join us as we explore Khalil's journey at the forefront of AI engineering.
Watch Khalil's original story: https://youtu.be/5FDYTw8CWws

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [MacRumors]M5 14‚Äù MacBook Pro ‚Äì Is It Worth Upgrading?

ns2:group.ns2:title: M5 14‚Äù MacBook Pro ‚Äì Is It Worth Upgrading?
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Apple‚Äôs latest entry-level 14-inch MacBook Pro with the M5 chip is here, and while it may look familiar, there are some solid performance gains under the hood. In this video, I go hands-on with the new model to see how it stacks up to last year‚Äôs M4 MacBook Pro and whether it‚Äôs worth upgrading.
The M5 chip brings up to 15% faster CPU, 30% faster graphics, and 45% faster ray tracing compared to the M4 ‚Äî plus new AI-focused optimizations that deliver serious boosts in real-world workloads. But is that enough to justify the upgrade? I‚Äôll walk through benchmarks, SSD speed tests, display differences, and who this MacBook is really for.

ns2:group.ns2:title: RDS for Db2 High Availability Disaster Recovery (HADR) | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
In this session we will explore newly added replica features added to RDS for Db2. We shall look at both read and standby replicas taking a moment to view some of the considerations of standby replicas.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]What Happens When Your Dog Uses the Internet | Ilyena Hirskyj-Douglas | TED

ns2:group.ns2:title: What Happens When Your Dog Uses the Internet | Ilyena Hirskyj-Douglas | TED
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Imagine this: you walk into a room, and your dog is on a video call with their fellow canine friends. Computer scientist Ilyena Hirskyj-Douglas thinks the notion of a social internet for animals is not far off. She explores what happens when animals control their own technology ‚Äî from parrots making friends online to monkeys choosing their favorite audio tracks ‚Äî and shows how this technology transforms our understanding of animal consciousness. (Recorded at TEDxManchester on March 1, 2025)

#Anker #AnkerNano #AnkerNanoPowerBank #AnkerNanoCharger _____________________ When Steve Jobs introduced the original iPhone, he said, "we‚Äôve designed something wonderful for your hand." And I honestly think that was an understatement. I remember holding the first iPhone and just saying, ‚Äúwow.‚Äù
Since then, only two models gave me that feeling. The iPhone X eight years ago, and this iPhone Air today. It is, without a doubt, the most wonderful phone for your hand. So why, then, aren't customers buying the iPhone Air nearly as often as the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, or iPhone 17 Pro Max models?

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Amazon Web Services]Agentless Scanning for EC2 Instances with Amazon Inspector | Amazon Web Services

ns2:group.ns2:title: Agentless Scanning for EC2 Instances with Amazon Inspector | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Amazon Inspector offers continuous monitoring of your Amazon EC2 instances for software vulnerabilities without installing an agent or additional software. With this capability, you can expand your vulnerability assessment coverage across your EC2 infrastructure with Amazon Inspector agentless scanning for EC2 instances that do not have SSM Agents installed or configured. For agentless scanning, Amazon Inspector takes snapshots of EBS volumes to collect software application inventory from the instances to perform vulnerability assessments. Once you enable EC2 scanning within Amazon Inspector, it automatically discovers all your EC2 instances and starts evaluating them for software vulnerabilities. Customers can enable agentless scanning by simply visiting the EC2 settings page within the Amazon Inspector console and selecting hybrid scan mode. In hybrid scan mode, Amazon Inspector relies on SSM Agents to collect information from instances to perform vulnerability assessments, and automatically switches to agentless scanning for instances that do not have SSM Agents installed or configured.
Learn more about Amazon Inspector: http://go.aws/43qLjwp

ns2:group.ns2:title: I Found the Future of Power Tools at China‚Äôs Canton Fair 2025
ns2:group.ns2:description:
I just discovered the future of power tools ‚Äî and it‚Äôs happening right here in Guangzhou, at the world‚Äôs biggest trade fair: The Canton Fair 2025! üá®üá≥ From next-gen mowers to intelligent tools and unstoppable innovation, this year‚Äôs Canton Fair proves why China remains the global hub of manufacturing and creativity.
In this video, I explore the 138th China Import and Export Fair, better known as the Canton Fair, where over 32,000 companies are showcasing cutting-edge technology, intelligent manufacturing, and green energy solutions. I came across one brand that really stood out ‚Äî redefining what outdoor power equipment can do with advanced engineering, bold design, and world-class quality.
If you‚Äôve ever wondered how China‚Äôs manufacturers are shaping the future of global trade ‚Äî this is the place to see it. Join me as I take you inside the energy, innovation, and business behind the world‚Äôs largest trade fair! #CantonFair2025 #ChinaTrade #MadeInChina #Innovation #PowerTools #Manufacturing #CantonFair

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Apple Developer]Day 1 | Create immersive media experiences for visionOS | Meet with Apple

ns2:group.ns2:title: Day 1 | Create immersive media experiences for visionOS | Meet with Apple
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Learn how to create compelling interactive experiences for visionOS and capture immersive video in this multi-day activity.
Bookmark the Day 2 livestream: https://youtube.com/live/4V_7-1bm4Rk
During this Day 1 livestream, we‚Äôll show how visionOS 26 can help you tell impactful immersive and interactive stories. You'll learn how to frame your creative ideas for formats like Apple Immersive Video and explore real-world examples from past productions. You'll discover how to design for spatial interaction and tell stories that make the audience part of your experience. And you'll find out how to use SharePlay and spatial Personas to help people connect over your ideas.
On Day 2, we‚Äôll dive deep into Apple Immersive Video and Apple Spatial Audio. You'll discover how to create entirely new media experiences, get started with Apple Immersive Video, explore new production workflows, and dig into previous Apple Immersive productions.
To explore additional sessions, appointments, and workshops, view the full schedule of Meet with Apple activities worldwide. https://apple.co/Meet-with-Apple
More Apple Developer resources: Video sessions: https://apple.co/VideoSessions Documentation: https://apple.co/DeveloperDocs Forums: https://apple.co/DeveloperForums App: https://apple.co/DeveloperApp
#visionOS #VisionPro #Apple

Apple just announced the new iPad Pro with the M5 chip ‚Äî and I‚Äôve got the 13-inch 512 GB model in Space Black to test. In this hands-on first look I walk through what‚Äôs new: the M5 chip (up to 15% faster CPU, 35% faster GPU), the new Wi-Fi 7/N1 chip, the C1X modem, faster SSD, updated RAM options, and more.
I‚Äôll dive into the real-world performance comparisons vs the previous gen (M4), including Geekbench results. Plus I‚Äôll cover whether the upgrade is worth it if you already own an iPad Pro.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]The Big Idea Funding Forest Conservation | Andika Putraditama | TED

ns2:group.ns2:title: The Big Idea Funding Forest Conservation | Andika Putraditama | TED
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Palm oil is in nearly every commodity you use ‚Äî food, shampoo, makeup and more ‚Äî but harvesting this essential material has contributed to the destruction of millions of hectares of forests globally. Sustainability leader Andika Putraditama shares how a groundbreaking collaboration between conservationists and global brands is turning this crisis on its head, unlocking a new model for forest preservation. Discover a vision for preserving the forests still standing and restoring the ones we‚Äôve lost. (Recorded at TED Countdown: Overcoming Dilemmas in the Green Transition on October 30, 2024)
Join us in person at a TED conference: https://tedtalks.social/events Become a TED Member to support our mission: https://ted.com/membership Subscribe to a TED newsletter: https://ted.com/newsletters
Follow TED! X: https://www.twitter.com/TEDTalks Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ted Facebook: https://facebook.com/TED LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/ted-conferences TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@tedtoks
The TED Talks channel features talks, performances and original series from the world's leading thinkers and doers. Subscribe to our channel for videos on Technology, Entertainment and Design ‚Äî plus science, business, global issues, the arts and more. Visit https://TED.com to get our entire library of TED Talks, transcripts, translations, personalized talk recommendations and more.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Jeff Su]Steal the Productivity System I Taught to 6,642 Googlers

ns2:group.ns2:title: Steal the Productivity System I Taught to 6,642 Googlers
ns2:group.ns2:description:
üìë¬†My blogpost on the CORE #workflow: https://www.jeffsu.org/i-taught-6-642-googlers-this-productivity-system
I'm sharing the exact #productivity system I taught to over 6,600 Google employees over nine years.
The CORE workflow handles all four types of workplace information through a simple four-step process: Capture everything immediately, Organize with minimal friction, Review during scheduled sessions, and Engage by blocking time to execute.
Trust me when I tell you it works with any tool you already use and becomes automatic within two weeks. No more relying on memory or willpower alone!
*TIMESTAMPS* 00:00 The Productivity System I Taught at Google 00:28 The Basics 01:05 The CORE Workflow in Action 02:50 Why This Works 04:10 Breaking Down the CORE Workflow 06:53 Recap of My Productivity System
*RESOURCES MENTIONED* üìß Subscribe to my newsletter - https://www.jeffsu.org/newsletter/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=description My favorite prompts & templates: https://www.jeffsu.org/links/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=191 üìà¬†The¬†Workspace Academy - https://academy.jeffsu.org/workspace-academy?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=191
*BUILD A POWERFUL WORKFLOW* üìà¬†The¬†Workspace Academy - https://academy.jeffsu.org/workspace-academy?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=191 ‚úçÔ∏è My Notion Command Center - https://www.pressplay.cc/link/s/DE1C4C50
*BE MY FRIEND:* üìß Subscribe to my newsletter - https://www.jeffsu.org/newsletter/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=description üì∏ Instagram - https://instagram.com/j.sushie ü§ù LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/jsu05/

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [The Verge]The new Xbox is not an Xbox | The Vergecast

ns2:group.ns2:title: The new Xbox is not an Xbox | The Vergecast
ns2:group.ns2:description:
We‚Äôre very bullish on the handheld future of gaming. But we‚Äôre not bullish on the new ROG Xbox Ally. The Verge‚Äôs Sean Hollister joins the show to explain why this Xbox-branded device barely feels like an Xbox, and why it‚Äôs definitely not a threat to the Steam Deck, before he and David debate whether the future of Xbox is even in good hands. After that, The Verge‚Äôs Hayden Field walks David through a couple of important recent studies, asking the same basic question: is AI making us dumb? Finally, Sean returns to answer a question from the Vergecast Hotline (call 866-VERGE11 or email vergecast@theverge.com!) about hybrid computers, which are an extremely 2012 idea and also maybe the future of computing. But probably not. #Vergecast #Technology #Podcast
0:00 Intro 2:02 The Xbox Ally and Ally X with The Verge's Sean Hollister 06:01 Xbox Ally and Ally X Pros and Cons 11:13 First User Experience: Windows Setup Frustrations 12:53 Why Steam Deck Still Wins on Simplicity 13:15 UI/UX Disappointments 15:45 How They Compare to Other Devices 16:31 Would You Buy It Over Other Handhelds? 18:31 Is Microsoft's Vision for Handheld Gaming Even Possible? 21:12 Why the PC Console Ecosystem ‚ÄúWorks‚Äù (Sort Of) 24:45 Microsoft's Strategic Crossroads: What's Next? 25:56 Nintendo Switch 2 and Third-Party Games 28:43 Should I Buy a Steam Deck? (Handheld Buying Advice) 34:08 Segment 2: AI Is Making Us Stupid? 36:09 AI/Brain Study and Results 38:24 What Did the Research Actually Find? 44:47 How Tech and AI Change Cognitive Skills 54:19 Is Losing Old Skills Bad or Just Different? 58:45 Who Should Take Responsibility for Tech‚Äôs Effects? 01:01:10 Faking Book Reports & How Teachers Are Adapting 01:03:08 Can AI Be a True Learning Tool? 01:10:28 Vergecast Hotline

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Practice Makes Fluent - Lifelong Learning]The Complete 3-Hour English Immersion: 500 Practical Conversations

ns2:group.ns2:title: The Complete 3-Hour English Immersion: 500 Practical Conversations
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Want to boost your English understanding and fluency? This video gives you 3 hours of nonstop listening practice with 300 everyday conversations. By making it part of your daily routine, you‚Äôll steadily build confidence and improve your communication skills. Use this video to: * Sharpen your listening ability * Start thinking in English * Respond more quickly in conversations * Pick up useful expressions for daily situations Listen anytime, as often as you like.Make it a regular habit, and you‚Äôll soon find yourself speaking English more smoothly and naturally.
